mapper.select: select a.MEMBER_NO, a.NAME, a.IDENTIFY_NO, a.GENDER, a.ADDR1, a.EMAIL, a.PHONE, b.PAST_HX, b.PRE_SELF_AX, b.TOPIC, b.MED_DELIVERY from member a join patients b on (a.member_no = b.member_no) where a.member_no =(select pt_no from booking where booking_no=#{bookingNo})
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CONSULTATION( CONSULT_DATE, PT_ASSESSMENT, PT_DIAGNOSIS, BOOKING_NO, PT_NO, DOC_NO ) values( sysdate, #{ptAssessment}, #{ptDiagnosis}, #{bookingNo}, #{ptNo}, #{docNo} )
mapper.select: select member_id from member where member_no=(select pt_no from booking where booking_no=#{bookingNo})
mapper.update: update consultation set prescription =#{prescription} where booking_no = #{bookingNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MED_DELIVERY ( MED_DELIVERY_NO, PHARMACY_NO, BOOKING_NO, PRESCRIPTION ) VALUES ( SEQ_MED_DELIVERY.NEXTVAL, (SELECT DEL_PHARMACY_NO FROM PATIENTS WHERE MEMBER_NO= (SELECT PT_NO FROM BOOKING WHERE BOOKING_NO =#{bookingNo})), #{bookingNo}, #{prescription} )
mapper.select: SELECT MEMBER_NO, NAME FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_NO =(SELECT DOC_NO FROM BOOKING WHERE BOOKING_NO=#{bookingNo})
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO COMMENTS( CMAIN_CATEGORY, CMAIN_NO, COMMENT_WRITER_NO, CONTENTS, REVIEW_POINT, REG_DATE, CNO, BOOKING_NO ) VALUES( #{cmainCategory}, #{cmainNo}, #{commentWriterNo}, #{contents}, #{reviewPoint}, SYSDATE, SEQ_COMMENTS.NEXTVAL, #{bookingNo} )
mapper.select: select * From comments where cmain_No=#{cmainNo} AND COMMENT_WRITER_NO=#{commentWriterNo} AND CMAIN_CATEGORY =#{cmainCategory}
